title: Piston - Wear Check

body.body: Remove any carbon build-up from the piston crown. Inspect the piston crown for signs of pitting and check the piston skirt and ring grooves for signs of wear or scuffing. If any sign of damage is found, renew the piston.
Measure the piston outside diameter 10 mm +/- 3 mm from the bottom of the piston and at 90° to the direction of the gudgeon pin.
